code:
timeline
    title Source Code Access Timeline

    section Initial Negotiations and Blockers
        Oct 20 : Initial Access Refusal ("Legal/NDA concerns")
               : Yann's Intervention ("We have NDA signed")
               : Access Promised for "Early next week"
        Oct 21 : Access Status: "Internal procedure in progress"
        Oct 24 : Observation: "25% of audit duration lost"

    section Code Reception and New Requests
        Oct 27 : Received .NET 3.1 code (ZIP format, no Git history)
        Oct 30 : Confirmation: Matching Engine is a "black box"
        Nov 04 : Received .NET 8 code (production version)
        Nov 05 : Git history requested
               : Status: Pending compliance review
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 接下来是关于 "Legal/NDA concerns" 和 "We have NDA signed" 的逻辑。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 '"Legal/NDA concerns" 和 "We have NDA signed"'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 ZIP format, no Git history 和 production version 的分支。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'ZIP format, no Git history 和 production version'，你看看合适吗？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
